The column that the control is added to.

param.para: The digit that the instance displays.
Please note that the value will be between 0 and 8, and the method will output the value and project the range to be between 1 and 9 automatically, so you should pass a value that is between 0 and 8.

Indicates the font style. The default value is .

member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator
member.summary: Defines a point calculator that interacts with the UI projects.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.DefaultOffset
member.summary: Indicates the default offset value.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.AnchorsCount
member.summary: Indicates the number of anchors hold per region.
member.remarks: The sudoku grid painter will draw the outlines and the inner lines, and correct the point of each digits (candidates also included). Each row or column always contains 27 candidates, so this value is 27.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.Width
member.summary: Indicates the width of the picture to draw.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.Height
member.summary: Indicates the height of the picture to draw.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.Offset
member.summary: Indicates the offset of the gap between the picture box outline and the sudoku grid outline.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.ControlSize
member.summary: Indicates the control size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.GridSize
member.summary: Indicates the grid size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.CellSize
member.summary: Indicates the cell size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.CandidateSize
member.summary: Indicates the candidate size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.UI.Drawing.PointCalculator.GridPoints
member.summary: Indicates the absolutely points in grid cross-lines. This property will be assigned later (and not ).
member.remarks: Note that the size of this array is always 28 x 28.
